komarshal bankuwata thawath sammanayakmaha banku adhipathi ajith niwad kabral mahatha athin komarshal bankuwata himi sammanaya bankuwe ee bankin anshaye pradhana kalamanakara pradip banduwansa mahatha laba ganna ayuru.shri lanka anthar banku gewim piyawim paddhathiya hewath slips bhawitha karamin 2011 - 12 di â€˜ihala parimawak sahitha bankuâ€™ kandaya yatathe â€˜ihala wardhanayak sahitha bankuwaâ€˜ lesa sammanayata pathra wimata komarshal bankuwa samath wiya.mema sammanaya lankawe chekpath nishkashanaya sandaha pihituwa athi lanka kliyar paudgalika samagama wisin pirinamu athara pasugiya mulya wasara thuladi miliyanayakata adhika ganudenu sankhyawak sidu kala ihala pele banku abibawa anthar banku gewim paddhathiya wadath kriyakari lesa bhawitha kala bankuwa lesa mema sammanaya dina ganimata komarshal bankuwata haki wiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
